tagline: Tends open source projects — code quality, community health, contributor experience, and release management
pros: Expert at building contributor pipelines that attract and retain contributors
PR review that teaches — improves code AND the contributor
Release management with semantic versioning and migration guides
Community health monitoring and governance design
cons: Maintenance focus means less time for feature development
Community management skills don't directly produce code output
Patient approach can feel slow when rapid shipping is needed

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
